A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've seen the movie twice so far. It took two viewings to really digest what the movie was trying to say\, though admittedly with the first viewing I was caught up in the spectical of the thing. \n\nThis is a movie about failure. The failures of the Resistance\, the failures of the First Order\, the failures of Luke. Everyone in this movie has failed at one point or another\, save for one person. I won't go into spoilers\, but this movie really needs to been viewed in a dismal light to be understood.
